name: Da Capo (record producer)
description: '''Nicodimas Sekheta Mogashoa''' (born  9 June 1992), professionally known as  '''Da Capo''' ({{IPAc-en|d|ɑː|_|ˈ|k|ɑː|p|oʊ}} {{respell|dah|_|KAH|poh}}; from [[da capo|the Italian musical phrase]]), is a South African DJ and record producer. Born and raised in [[Seshego]], Da Capo rose to prominence after [[remix]]ing the [[Single (music)|single]] "Pretty Disaster" by [[Moneoa]]. He then signed a recording deal with Soulstic Music and his studio debut album ''Indigo Child'' (2017), which was certified double platinum by the [[Recording Industry of South Africa]] (RiSA).
